metadata.title: Thursday, 11th July, 2019
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) when the tarring of the Samfya-Lubwe-Kasaba road in Chifunabuli Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b) whether the project is on schedule;
(c) if not, what has caused the delay in completing the project;
(d) what measures are being taken to expedite the works; and
(e) whether the initial time frame for the completion of the project has been revised.
(a) when the construction of communication towers in Mwandi Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b) how many towers are earmarked for construction in 2019; and
(c) in which areas the towers will be situated.

questions.minister: Minister of Housing and Infrastructure Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the following bridges in Lundazi Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Ndonda; (ii) Kapichila; and (iii) Muthu Wanjobvu; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
